Multimedia.title: What makes a video go viral? Emergence!
Multimedia.lessonRelevance: Summarizes key take-homes from lesson 2. Students will have explored The Game of Life to discover what *emergence* means.

Multimedia.title: "Swimming in the Dark"
Multimedia.lessonRelevance: Run digital experiments to understand fish schooling.

Multimedia.title: "EchoSim" Echo Chamber Simulation
Multimedia.lessonRelevance: Explore how different human variables (like tolerance) affect social media networks.
